description: This file defines a custom React hook named useIntersection that observes a DOM element's intersection with the viewport to toggle visibility, useful for triggering animations upon entering the viewport. It includes options for delay, root margin, threshold, respecting user reduced motion preferences, and whether to observe only once.

methods.name: useIntersection({ root = null, rootMargin = "0px", threshold = 0.15, once = true, delay = 0, respectReducedMotion = true, } = {})
